des: "My mom used to make these when it was going to be a busy night. Now I make them for my daughters busy nights."
ins: Place ground beef in a large, deep skillet. Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown. Drain excess fat. Stir in pizza sauce, and heat through. Spoon onto buns and top with cheese. Microwave for 15 to 20 seconds, or until cheese is melted.
